rows.label: bf08190100_0010
rows.name:
So Blades are born from crystals,
and Divine Beasts from Blades...

rows.label: bf08190100_0020
rows.name: The Divine Beast, in turn, nurtures life...

rows.label: bf08190100_0030
rows.name: And someday births new Core Crystals.

rows.label: bf08190100_0040
rows.name: Right. That's the life cycle of a Blade...

rows.label: bf08190100_0050
rows.name: Such is the law ordained by God.

rows.label: bf08190100_0080
rows.name: ...we revered the Divine Beasts. Feared them.

rows.label: bf08190100_0090
rows.name:
It was the sacred foundation of Iira. A nation where
humans and Blades lived in harmony.
